original_text: Then the third angel made a sound with his trumpet. I saw a very big star, which was burning with a bright light. It fell from the sky on a third of the rivers and the springs of water.
korean_text: 셋째 천사가 나팔을 부니 횃불 같이 타는 큰 별이 하늘에서 떨어져 강들의 삼분의 일과 여러 물샘에 떨어지니

sentences.original_text: Then the third angel made a sound with his trumpet
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 세 번째 천사가 나팔을 불었어요

sentences.original_text: I saw a very big star
which was burning with a bright light
on a third of the rivers
